Text:
Thanks for the great posts.
Anybody going to bother seeding??

Tim Blake (aka Moonweed)
I wish I had, he's a hell of a keyboard wizard.

But I do have:
Clearlight - Clearlight Symphony
  (synth + percussion);
Gong - Radio Gnome Invisible Vol 2 Angels egg
  (VCS3 synth, vocals);
Gong - Radio Gnome Invisible Vol 3 You
  (Moog & EMS synths, Mellotron);
Steve Hillage - Fish Rising
  (synthesizers, tamboura).
Why has PB been having server issues so much lately? Seems like every time I turn around I can't access the servers for downloading...
Doesn't anyone out there have Thunder Island? Or maybe "The 12 Dreams of Dr. Sardonicus"?
Thank you dearly ecolo...peace and love men
@ dickspic...your tops man forever sunshine to you too..
